content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **english version available here 2 ** **materials ** japanese size 4/0 crochet hook 2 5mm gauge information only says that one row of double_crochet us should be 1cm tall **note ** the pattern says that the entire doily is to be crocheted with 2 strands held together 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/26-224-ami/ 2 https //gosyo co jp/english/pattern/ehtml/epdf/1303/26-224-ami_flower-patterned_doily pdf
